text:
[Verse]
Stepping out the shadows
Feeling light in my toes
Raindrops fall they whisper
Nature's call gets closer

[Verse 2]
Cloudy skies don’t matter
We’re together laughter
Feeling life it’s magic
Every drop fantastic

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain now
Twirl and spin around wow
Let the rhythm guide us
Make the moment priceless

[Bridge]
Barefoot on the pavement
Heartbeats like a statement
All we need is right here
Wash away the last tear

[Verse 3]
Puddle jumps and laughter
Echoes in the rafters
Thunder roars like music
Bolt of light they lose it

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain now
Twirl and spin around wow
Let the rhythm guide us
Make the moment priceless
title: Dancing in the Rain
